Thomas Robert Stubbs

  1. Foster Name: Thomas Testman
  2. Alternate Foster Name: Robbin
  3. Foster Family: Mary Testman
  4. Location of Family: Grand Island, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  6. Arrival Place: Unknown
  7. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  8. Date of Birth: 8/25/1909, New York City, NY
  9. Date of Death: 7/11/1985, CA
  10. Gender: male
  11. Source: 1920 United States Federal Census; National Orphan Train Complex; Social Security Death Index; Modesto Bee, 12 July 1985.
